author: Reuters Editorial
title: Put holiday homes on hold, Irish police warn wannabe weekenders
description: Ireland's police chief told people who broke coronavirus containment rules to travel to a holiday home that they must stay put until the restrictions are lifted, in a warning to others not to be tempted.
content:
DUBLIN (Reuters) - Ireland’s police chief told people who broke coronavirus containment rules to travel to a holiday home that they must stay put until the restrictions are lifted, in a warning to others not to be tempted.
